quote_first: The two policemen arrived at the Hotel Monarche at
quote_last: that Thursday morning. They were tired, discontent, and hungry. Since midnight they had visited forty-three hotels on the west side of the city, on each occasion with no success.
title: A Matter of Honor
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: The Chairman got out of bed at
quote_last: and lit his first cigarette. He couldn’t remember exactly when he had woken. At 6:10 he had phoned Tony, who was already up and waiting for his call.
